options.name: Masochist
options.description: Your Maximum Health is increased in an amount equal to your Level, but you can no longer benefit from Temporary Health.

options.name: Free Action : Reckless Onslaught
options.description: You leap up to your Jump distance. If your next Melee Attack hits on this turn, it is upgraded to a True Hit. Until the start of your next turn, the first Melee Attack that hits you is also upgraded to a True Hit.

options.name: Action : Anguishing Strike
options.description: You make an Attack with a melee weapon that deals an additional 1d8 Primary Damage if you are below your Maximum Health. This bonus is increaesd to 2d8 when below half your Maximum Health, and 4d8 while in lifeline.

options.name: Chase the Pain
options.description: While at or below half your maximum Health, you gain a 1d4 bonus to Melee Attacks but have a 1d4 Penalty when at your Health maximum.

options.name: Focused Agony
options.description: Gain +1 Concentration. Additionally, While you are below half Health, you are immune to the Confused, Dazed and Stunned conditions.

options.name: Savored Death
options.description: Gain +1 Resilience. Additionally, when you enter lifeline, you gain a Heroic Action.

options.name: Reaction : Pain Threshold
options.description: In response to taking Damage, make a Resilience Check and reduce the damage by that amount. If you are below half your maximum Health before taking the damage, this does not count against your unique Reaction limit.
